entry.title: omerbsezer/Fast-Terraform
entry.summary: This repo covers Terraform (Infrastructure as Code) with LABs using AWS: Resources, Data Sources, Variables, Meta Arguments, Provisioners, Dynamic Blocks, Modules, Workspaces, Provisioning AWS Resources (EC2, EBS, EFS, VPC, IAM Policies, Roles, ECS, ECR, Fargate, EKS, Lambda, API-Gateway, ELB, S3, CloudFront, ASG, CodePipeline, etc. )
